author: sandrofonseca
body:
Dear experts,

We are opening a new PR for SimTransport/HectorProducerForCTPPS for 90. It include a small bug fix to work in 81 and 90. So you can start your review.

We believe that old PR should be closed.

Cheers,
Sandro
title: New PR to make a integration of the SimTransport/HectorProducerForCTPPS_CMSSW_9_0
